document_data.caption: A map showing the Islands of the Utter South in the Crowded Sea.
document_data.name: Islands of the Utter South
document_data.mainbody: The '''Islands of the Utter South''', also simply called the '''Utter South''', was a series of unexplored islands found south of the known regions of the [[Crowded Sea]].
document_data.Geography: Situated south of the [[Djinni's Claws]], the [[Steaming Isles]], and [[Bariya]], the Islands of the Utter South sprawled east to west for over a thousand miles across waters that most sailing vessels wisely avoided.<ref>
document_data.Description: The various islands were clumped into a roughly linear chain. Many of the islands were forested, but as of [[1367 DR]] no [[Zakharan (ethnicity)|Zakharan]] had dared explore the region.<ref><ref>
